de.codescape.bitvunit.report
Interface ReportWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractReportWriter, TextReportWriter, XmlReportWriter
public interface ReportWriter

Common interface for any class that writes out reports for this framework.

Author:
Stefan Glase

Method Detail

writeReport

void writeReport(com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlPage htmlPage,
                 RuleSet ruleSet,
                 Violations violations)
Writes the report for the htmlPage checked against the ruleSet and with the violations result.

Parameters:
htmlPage - HtmlPage that was checked
ruleSet - RuleSet that was used
violations - Violations that were found
